title: Hello, there
name: Mustofa Ghaleb Amami
role: Tech Lead Fullstack & Software Engineering Lecturer
hero-description: As Tech Team Lead at Deriv, I transform ideas into robust web and mobile platforms that empower millions of users. I'm also honored to guide the next generation of engineers at RevoU, sharing the passion and practical wisdom gained from years in the industry. Every line of code I write is driven by a commitment to creating experiences that are both powerful and delightful.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Technology is more than just code—it's about solving real problems and touching lives. As a Tech Team Lead at Deriv and Software Engineering Lecturer at RevoU, I bring together technical excellence and a deep understanding of what users truly need. With expertise spanning JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js, I've had the privilege of leading teams and mentoring passionate developers on their journey to becoming great engineers. I believe the magic happens when creativity, empathy, and technical skill converge.
about.learning: The learning never stops! I'm constantly exploring new horizons—Kotlin, Flutter, Swift, Go, Python—while staying connected to the pulse of our ever-evolving industry.

what-i-do.title: What I Do
what-i-do.content: At Deriv, I lead our web platform fullstack development team, orchestrating complex initiatives like OAuth implementation and crafting seamless partner onboarding experiences. Beyond the corporate world, my heart finds joy in the classroom at RevoU, where I've had the honor of guiding hundreds of aspiring engineers as they discover their potential. My technical toolkit—React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern CSS frameworks—is always at the service of creating solutions that truly matter.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.content: Kind words from colleagues who've been part of my journey.
testimonials.trusted: Grateful for the trust and collaboration from talented individuals I've had the honor to work alongside.
testimonials.quote1: Mustofa brings both technical excellence and genuine care to everything he does. His ability to understand complex problems and guide teams toward elegant solutions is truly remarkable. Working with him has been both inspiring and rewarding.
testimonials.author1: Yashim Wong, Staff Engineer at Deriv
testimonials.quote2: What sets Mustofa apart is not just his technical prowess, but his warm approach to leadership and mentorship. He has a gift for making challenging concepts accessible and creating an environment where everyone feels valued and motivated to grow.
